description.en: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.ar: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.br: Permite ressuscitar o personagem no local de sua morte e evita a perda de Exp. (Evita a perda de 10% EXP para usuários com Karma)
description.cns: 允许角色死亡时可立即原地复活，且不会失去经验值。 (防止有罪恶值的用户失去10%经验)
description.de: Wenn du stirbst, kannst du dich mit dieser Rolle an Ort und Stelle wiederbeleben. Du verlierst keine EXP.
description.fi: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.fil: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.fr: Parchemin protégeant le personnage pour qu'il ressuscite sur place sans pénalité d'expérience - s'active automatiquement à la mort du personnage en proposant une nouvelle option dans la fenêtre de résurrection (attention : un joueur PK perdra de l'expérience !)
description.id: Memungkinkan karakter untuk menghidupkan kembali di mana ia mati, dan mencegah hilangnya Exp melalui kematian. (Mencegah hilangnya 10% Exp untuk pengguna dengan Karma)
description.it: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.jp: 死亡時にデスペナルティも受けずにその場で復活できる巻物。（カオスユーザーの場合は10％の経験値損失を防ぐのみ）
description.kr: 사용 후 사망하는 경우 사망 자리에 부활이 가능하며, 경험치 페널티가 면제됩니다. 캐릭터가 사망할 때까지 지속됩니다.(카르마가 있는 유저 사용 시 경험치 10% 복구)
description.nl: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.pl: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.ru: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.sp: Permite que el personaje reviva donde murió y evita la pérdida de Exp por muerte. (Evita la pérdida del 10% de Exp a los usuarios con Karma)
description.sw: Allows the character to revive where it died, and prevents the loss of Exp through death. (Prevents the loss of 10% Exp for users with Karma)
description.th: ให้ตัวละครฟื้นคืนชีพในจุดที่ตาย และป้องกันการสูญเสีย Exp จากการตาย (ป้องกันการสูญเสีย 10% Exp สำหรับผู้ใช้ Karma)
description.tw: 角色死亡時身上有此物品可原地立即復活並且不會失去經驗值。(紅人狀態下死亡，將會保留原本死亡後所喪失經驗值之10%)
description.vi: Cho phép nhân vật hồi sinh tại nơi đã chết và ngăn chặn việc mất Exp khi chết. (Ngăn mất 10% Exp cho người dùng có Karma)
